Package com.independentid.scim.backend

Interface IScimProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackendProvider
    public interface IScimProvider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ScimResponse bulkRequest​(RequestCtx ctx, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Performs a SCIM Bulk Operation request as per RFC7644, Section 3.7
      ScimResponse create​(RequestCtx ctx, ScimResource res)  
      ScimResponse delete​(RequestCtx ctx)
      Performs a SCIM DELETE resource request as per RFC7644, Section 3.6
      ScimResponse get​(RequestCtx ctx)
      Get performs a search and can return 1 or more results.
      PersistStateResource getConfigState()
      Used to return the current configuration state of the backend provider.
      ScimResource getResource​(RequestCtx ctx)
      Get Resource returns a single document and does NOT process a filter.
      ScimResource getTransactionRecord​(java.lang.String transid)
      Used to obtain information about the transaction previously committed in the provider.
      void init()
      Called to request the provider initialize itself and complete startup.
      boolean isTransactionPresent​(java.lang.String transid)
      Used by the replication event processing system to detect if the cluster has already processed a transaction in the case of 1 or more cluster members receiving the same event.
      java.util.Collection<ResourceType> loadResourceTypes()
      This method is typically called by ConfigMgr to load the system SCIM ResourceType definitions.
      java.util.Collection<Schema> loadSchemas()
      This method is typically called by ConfigMgr to load the system SCIM Schema definitions.
      ScimResponse patch​(RequestCtx ctx, JsonPatchRequest req)
      Performs a SCIM PATCH request as per RFC7644, Section 3.5.2 based on RFC6902 JSON Patch Specification
      ScimResponse put​(RequestCtx ctx, ScimResource replaceResource)
      Performs a SCIM PUT request as per RFC7644, Section 3.5.1
      boolean ready()  
      void shutdown()
      Called when the server is in the process of shutdown to enable a graceful shut down.

      This method is typically called by a CreateOp, DeleteOp, Put or Patch Op, after any write transaction.
      void syncConfig​(java.util.Collection<Schema> schemaCol, java.util.Collection<ResourceType> resTypeCol)
      This method allows the provider to persist/update current configuration (schema defs and resource types).

    • Method Detail

      • create

        ScimResponse create​(RequestCtx ctx,
                    ScimResource res)
             throws ScimException,
                    BackendException
        Throws:
        ScimException
        BackendException

      • get

        ScimResponse get​(RequestCtx ctx)
          throws ScimException,
                 BackendException
        Get performs a search and can return 1 or more results.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The SCIM processed HTTP context
        Returns:
        A ScimResponse containing the results of the get request
        Throws:
        ScimException - when SCIM protocol level error is detected
        BackendException - when the storage handler returns an error not related to SCIM

      • getResource

        ScimResource getResource​(RequestCtx ctx)
                  throws ScimException,
                         BackendException
        Get Resource returns a single document and does NOT process a filter.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The SCIM request context (includes HTTP Context). Defines the search filter (if any) along with other search parameters like attributes requested
        Returns:
        The found ScimResource resource or NULL.
        Throws:
        ScimException - when SCIM protocol level error is detected
        BackendException - when the storage handler returns an error not related to SCIM

      • put

        ScimResponse put​(RequestCtx ctx,
                 ScimResource replaceResource)
          throws ScimException,
                 BackendException
        Performs a SCIM PUT request as per RFC7644, Section 3.5.1
        Parameters:
        ctx - The RequestCtx containing the path, filter, attributes and other request modifiers
        replaceResource - A ScimResource object containing the claims to replace the existing resource.
        Returns:
        ScimResponse containing the final representation of the replaced resource.
        Throws:
        ScimException - when SCIM protocol level error is detected
        BackendException - when the storage handler returns an error not related to SCIM

      • patch

        ScimResponse patch​(RequestCtx ctx,
                   JsonPatchRequest req)
            throws ScimException,
                   BackendException
        Performs a SCIM PATCH request as per RFC7644, Section 3.5.2 based on RFC6902 JSON Patch Specification
        Parameters:
        ctx - The RequestCtx containing the path, filter, attributes and other request modifiers
        req - A JsonPatchRequest object containing the claims to replace the existing resource.
        Returns:
        A ScimResponse containing the final representation of the replaced resource.
        Throws:
        ScimException - when SCIM protocol level error is detected
        BackendException - when the storage handler returns an error not related to SCIM

      • bulkRequest

        ScimResponse bulkRequest​(RequestCtx ctx,
                         com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
                  throws ScimException,
                         BackendException
        Performs a SCIM Bulk Operation request as per RFC7644, Section 3.7
        Parameters:
        ctx - The RequestCtx containing the path, filter, attributes and other request modifiers
        node - A JsonNode object containing SCIM formated bulk request
        Returns:
        A ScimResponse containing the results of the bulk request per Sec 3.7.3
        Throws:
        ScimException - when SCIM protocol level error is detected. May throw circular reference and other identifier errors.
        BackendException - when the storage handler returns an error not related to SCIM

      • delete

        ScimResponse delete​(RequestCtx ctx)
             throws ScimException,
                    BackendException
        Performs a SCIM DELETE resource request as per RFC7644, Section 3.6
        Parameters:
        ctx - The RequestCtx containing the path of the resource to be removed.
        Returns:
        A ScimResponse containing confirmation of success per Sec 3.6
        Throws:
        ScimException - when SCIM protocol level error is detected
        BackendException - when the storage handler returns an error not related to SCIM

      • init

        void init()
   throws BackendException
        Called to request the provider initialize itself and complete startup. Upon successful startup, the ready() method should return true. Providers should avoid doing substantial work during construction and should do all work during init.
        Throws:
        BackendException - May be thrown when the provider cannot be initialized or connection established. This will cause the server to fail startup.

      • ready

        boolean ready()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the provider is fully initialized and ready.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Called when the server is in the process of shutdown to enable a graceful shut down. Control should not be returned until shutdown is safe.

      • getConfigState

        PersistStateResource getConfigState()
                             throws ScimException,
                                    java.io.IOException,
                                    java.text.ParseException
        Used to return the current configuration state of the backend provider. In particular it is used for co-ordinating persisted schema and resource types and co-ordinating synchronization. May also be used to test database live-ness.
        Returns:
        The PersistStateResoruce that holds the current schema sync state of the server.
        Throws:
        ScimException - occurs when a general scim server occurs
        java.io.IOException - occurs when attempting to read/write data
        java.text.ParseException - occurs when invalid JSON data is encountered

      • loadSchemas

        java.util.Collection<Schema> loadSchemas()
                                  throws ScimException
        This method is typically called by ConfigMgr to load the system SCIM Schema definitions. This method checks the existing database for schema definitions, and if not defined, loads the schema from the default file path provided.
        Returns:
        A LinkedHashMap containing the Schema definitions loaded. If none are available, the map is empty.
        Throws:
        ScimException - Occurs when an invalid state or configuration occurs

      • loadResourceTypes

        java.util.Collection<ResourceType> loadResourceTypes()
                                              throws ScimException
        This method is typically called by ConfigMgr to load the system SCIM ResourceType definitions. This method checks the existing database for ResourceType end points, and if not defined, loads the ResourceTypes from the default file path provided.
        Returns:
        A LinkedHashMap containing the ResourceType definitions loaded. If none are available, the map is empty.
        Throws:
        ScimException - Occurs when an invalid state or configuration occurs

      • syncConfig

        void syncConfig​(java.util.Collection<Schema> schemaCol,
                java.util.Collection<ResourceType> resTypeCol)
         throws java.io.IOException
        This method allows the provider to persist/update current configuration (schema defs and resource types). This method may be called on-the-fly due to a configuration modification or prior to shutdown.
        Parameters:
        schemaCol - A collection of Schemas to be synchronized in the provider
        resTypeCol - A collection of ResourceTypes to be synchronized in the provider
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - May occur when attempting to read/write data from the underlying provider

      • getTransactionRecord

        ScimResource getTransactionRecord​(java.lang.String transid)
                           throws BackendException
        Used to obtain information about the transaction previously committed in the provider. The value in Meta.revisions can be used as the query term.
        Parameters:
        transid - The transaction id (e.g. from Meta.revisions.value or RequestCtx.getTranID().
        Returns:
        The TransactionRecord in the form of ScimResource containing information about the transaction (a ScimResource).
        Throws:
        BackendException - when an error occurs in the underlying provider such as a mapping error due to corruption

      • isTransactionPresent

        boolean isTransactionPresent​(java.lang.String transid)
                      throws BackendException
        Used by the replication event processing system to detect if the cluster has already processed a transaction in the case of 1 or more cluster members receiving the same event.
        Parameters:
        transid - The transaction UUID string value to be checked (from RequestCtx.getTranId()).
        Returns:
        true if present in the transaction store of the provider.
        Throws:
        BackendException - when an error occurs in the underlying provider such as a mapping error due to corruption

      • storeTransactionRecord

        void storeTransactionRecord​(TransactionRecord record)
                     throws DuplicateTxnException
        This method is typically called by a CreateOp, DeleteOp, Put or Patch Op, after any write transaction.
        Parameters:
        record - A TransactionRecord containing information about the update.
        Throws:
        DuplicateTxnException - if the transactionId already exists in the provider, an exception is thrown.
